name: Study Circle
description: An online group study platform where students can collaborate on assignments and grade each other's work.
challenges: Implementing real-time collaborative features (chat, live updates) using WebSockets.
Ensuring data security for user-generated content and grades.
Integrating third-party services for assignment submission and feedback.
limitations: Currently lacks mobile app support; will focus on it in future versions.
Real-time functionality is not as smooth as desired due to limitations in WebSocket handling.
improvements: Optimizing backend performance to handle large numbers of concurrent users.
Enhancing user interface for a more intuitive experience, especially for first-time users.

name: Crowdcube
description: A crowdfunding platform where entrepreneurs can raise capital from investors.
challenges: Implementing user authentication with secure token handling for investors and project owners.
Building an efficient, scalable architecture for handling thousands of investor transactions.
Ensuring data integrity between investors and entrepreneurs, especially in sensitive financial transactions.
limitations: Limited search and filter options for investment opportunities.
The platform only supports one payment gateway, restricting potential international users.
improvements: Expanding payment gateway options to support international transactions.
Adding advanced search and filter functionalities for better user experience.

name: Winter Donation
description: A web application that allows people to donate winter clothing to those in need.
challenges: Integrating location-based features to help users find nearby donation drives.
Ensuring proper tracking of donations to avoid confusion in the distribution process.
Handling large image uploads for product listings while maintaining optimal performance.
limitations: The donation tracking system is in the early stages and could be more robust.
Limited promotional reach; the platform needs better marketing to attract more donors.
improvements: Introducing geolocation services to suggest nearby donation opportunities.
Improving image upload and processing features for better performance.
